articles.content: Late night talk show host Jimmy Fallon had faced an onslaught of criticism this week after a video resurfaced of a comedy sketch he did in 2000 where he wore blackface.The clip is from an old episode… [+3726 chars]

articles.author: Phoebe Loomes
articles.title: Ellen DeGeneres: Inside TV-star's fall from grace - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Ellen DeGeneres has a long history of being bashed by the media
articles.content: Its been a bad year for a lot of people, but particularly for Ellen DeGeneres. After offhandedly referring to coronavirus shelter-in-place restrictions as being “like jail” from inside her multimilli… [+5746 chars]

articles.author: https://www.abc.net.au/news/emilia-terzon/5769642, https://www.abc.net.au/news/ben-knight/166868
articles.title: What will live music look like after coronavirus? Don't expect a dance floor - ABC News
articles.description: In Australia's music capital, there are glimmers of hope for the return of live music. But it'll be drastically different and more expensive, and industry is warning beloved venues will close forever unless governments step in.
articles.content: Standing in the empty band room of Fitzroy's The Nightcat, co-owner Justin Stanford is looking at a set-up drastically different to what it was before COVID-19 closed the Melbourne jazz club in March… [+9190 chars]
